content: While there are several tools and resources available for traders, some are actuallymore valuable than others, how about you know when institutions are buying or selling off btc in market moving sizes? there is a tool that put alot of traders in advantage if you know how to use it, it is an insider information on institutional and large speculators positioning on several assets and assets clases btc inclusive.    It is called the cot report, it is a report published weekly by the Comodity futures trading commission, which is a US based regulatory body for the derivatives market, their report gives insight into institutional position on btc which is a high value information for traders and when used properly can put a trader at an advantage wether you want to HODL,DCA or spot trade btc, the report is found on the cftc official website, or just Google cftc...
